thread.section_title: Groupon Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Groupon | www.groupon.com | 24 of 235
thread.title: Zoe

author: Zoe
title: Zoe
text: I bought several orders of socks from Groupon in different patterns. They sent the wrong pattern on one order. When I clicked on the return button it says Non returnable but apaperwork in the package says for returns contact groupon. I emailed them through the groupon system days ago and have not heard anything. This is unusual for groupon. Hope it is not a sign of customer service slippage. I ordered a pattern of "reindeer" socks and was sent A heart pattern instead
